me mata eemelayakin aa pinthurayak, eeth mehi sagawunu yamak thibena nisa mage blog adawiye pala karanna hithuna.me lankawe nagenahira, mulathiw idiri aarakshaka simawe awasan gatum athiwuna welawayi. me kisi lesakin wath winasha kala nohi maha thrasthawadi kandayamak lesa nam daruwan, dasa dahasak ahinsaka siwil wasiyange chiwtha winasha kalath thamange chiwithayada ahimi wana lakunu daka awasana kese ho thama chiwithaya bera ganime atiyen owun sathu athi mahath awi aayudha gini gasa ee gini mathin pana yamata daru lamaka uthsahaye awasan mohothayi.ahinsaka siwil chanathawa minis palihak se thaba ganimn ee thulin thama chiwithaya aaraksha kara gannata sithu eeniya koti thrasthayin awasana e ahinsaka chanathawa radi siti bime melesa gini awuluwa dammeya.me oba dakinne e awasthawe ehi sirawu asarana kuda daruweku e gini kanda madin aarakshithawa ragena ena apage wirodara ranawiruwekuge chayarupayayi.
